greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of log(2)/3.
comment: This number is involved as an addend or subtrahend in the closed forms of certain series of reciprocals of integers (see for example A113476).
reference: L. B. W. Jolley, Summation of Series, Dover (1961).
Murray R. Spiegel, Seymour Lipschutz, John Liu. Mathematical Handbook of Formulas and Tables, 3rd Ed. Schaum's Outline Series. New York: McGraw-Hill (2009): p. 135, equations 21.16 and 21.18.
formula: Equals lim_{n->infinity} [Sum_{i = 1..n} i^2/(n^3 + i^3)]. - [Jolley eq 292, p.52]
results.author: _Alonso del Arte_, Jul 29 2011
